tls:srcline.title: 鎮州臨濟慧照禪師語錄

tls:text.tls:srcline: 夫為法者，不避喪身失命。

tls:line.title: 鎮州臨濟慧照禪師語錄 (en)

tls:text.tls:line: if it's for the sake of the Dharma, don't hesitate to sacrifice your bodies or give up your lives!

sense.def: come to lose what one used to own (e.g. a city, an arm); lose control of; fail to get right what one ought to get right (timing); MENG: fail to stick to (the Way), stray from, disregard; lose count of (the date); stray from (the right road); lose contact with (a person)
